item.title: CinemaCon 2025 Live Blog: Day 2
item.description: Follow along with ScreenRant for live updates on CinemaCon, the annual movie theater industry convention. Coming up today – Lionsgate & Warner Bros.!

item.title: Aftersun's "Under Pressure" Scene Explained: What Calum & Sophie's Dance Really Means
item.description: Calum and Sophie's dance to "Under Pressure" is one of Aftersun's most heartwarming moments, but it has a deeper meaning that's not so heartwarming.

item.title: Mickey 17 Digital & Blu-Ray Release Dates Revealed
item.description: The digital and Blu-ray release dates for Bong Joon Ho’s Mickey 17 have been revealed, less than a month after the movie made its theatrical debut.
